thread.title: Balanced scoring leads Winnipeg Jets to season-opening blowout over Bruins [Photos]
thread.title_full: Balanced scoring leads Winnipeg Jets to season-opening blowout over Bruins [Photos]

title: Balanced scoring leads Winnipeg Jets to season-opening blowout over Bruins [Photos]
text:
By Ken Wiebe , Winnipeg Sun First posted: Thursday, October 08, 2015 08:39 PM CDT | Updated: Thursday, October 08, 2015 10:59 PM CDT Jets vs. Bruins Previous Next 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Winnipeg Jets center Nicolas Petan (19) celebrates after scoring a goal past Boston Bruins goalie Tuukka Rask (40) during the third period at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Nikolaj Ehlers #27 of the Winnipeg Jets congratulates Mark Scheifele #55 after he scored against the Boston Bruins during the second period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Dustin Byfuglien #33 of the Winnipeg Jets congratulates Mark Scheifele #55 after he scored a goal against the Boston Bruins during the second period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Tyler Myers #57 of the Winnipeg Jets and Matt Beleskey #39 of the Boston Bruins battle for control of the puck during Beleskey's first game with the Bruins in the third period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. The Jets defeat the Bruins 6-2. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Winnipeg Jets right wing Drew Stafford (12) celebrates with teammates on the bench after scoring a goal during the second period against the Boston Bruins at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports USA Today Sports 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Chris Thorburn #22 of the Winnipeg Jets celebrates after scoring against the Boston Bruins during the third period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. The Jets defeat the Bruins 6-2. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Winnipeg Jets head coach Paul Maurice talks to his players in a timeout during the third period of an NHL hockey game against the Boston Bruins in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Kevan Miller #86 of the Boston Bruins and Adam Lowry #17 of the Winnipeg Jets battle for control of the puck during the second period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Winnipeg Jets right wing Blake Wheeler (26) skates with the puck past Boston Bruins defenseman Zach Trotman (62) during the first period at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports USA Today Sports 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Winnipeg Jets defenseman Tyler Myers (57) skates with the puck as Boston Bruins center Patrice Bergeron (37) defends during the second period at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports USA Today Sports 
Boston Bruins center David Krejci (46) beats Winnipeg Jets goalie Ondrej Pavelec (31) for a goal during the first period of an NHL hockey game in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Krejci and Pavelec are both from he Czech Republic. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP 
Winnipeg Jets right wing Chris Thorburn (22) looks back as he scores against Boston Bruins goalie Tuukka Rask, of Finland, during the third period of an NHL hockey game in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Bruins center David Krejci, center, of the Czech Republic, looks on. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Dustin Byfuglien #33 of the Winnipeg Jets checks Jimmy Hayes #11 of the Boston Bruins into the boards during Hayes' first NHL appearance for the Bruins during the third period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. The Jets defeat the Bruins 6-2. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Winnipeg Jets center Nicolas Petan (19) celebrates with right wing Chris Thorburn (22) and center Andrew Copp (9) after scoring a goal during the third period again the Boston Bruins at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports USA Today Sports 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Adam McQuaid #54 of the Boston Bruins and Andrew Ladd #16 of the Winnipeg Jets are separated by a referee during the first period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Oct 8, 2015; Boston, MA, USA; Boston Bruins left wing Brad Marchand (63) shoots the puck to score a goal during the second period against the Winnipeg Jets at TD Garden. Mandatory Credit: Bob DeChiara-USA TODAY Sports USA Today Sports 
BOSTON, MA - OCTOBER 08: Patrice Bergeron #37 of the Boston Bruins and Adam Lowry #17 of the Winnipeg Jets are separated during a fight in the first period at TD Garden on October 8, 2015 in Boston, Massachusetts. Maddie Meyer/Getty Images/AFP == FOR NEWSPAPERS, INTERNET, TELCOS & TELEVISION USE ONLY == AFP 
Winnipeg Jets goalie Ondrej Pavelec drops to the ice to make a save against the Boston Bruins during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP 
Winnipeg Jets defenseman Ben Chiarot (7) drops to a knee to block a shot by Boston Bruins center David Krejci, of the Czech Republic, during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP 
Winnipeg Jets center Nicolas Petan, center, celebrates with Chris Thorburn (22) and Andrew Copp (9) after his goal against Boston Bruins goalie Tuukka Rask, of Finland, during the third period of an NHL hockey game in Boston, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa) AP
